original_text:
As a young man marries a young woman,
    so will your Builder marry you;
as a bridegroom rejoices over his bride,
    so will your God rejoice over you.
korean_text: 마치 청년이 처녀와 결혼함 같이 네 아들들이 너를 취하겠고 신랑이 신부를 기뻐함 같이 네 하나님이 너를 기뻐하시리라

sentences.original_text: As a young man marries a young woman
so will your Builder marry you
sentences.korean_translation: 너를 세우시는 네 하나님이 너와 결혼하실 것이며

sentences.original_text: As a bridegroom rejoices over his bride
so will your God rejoice over you
